select e.id, lpad(e.employee_code, 6 ,'0') emp_id, e.first_name, e.last_name, o.name org_name, o.description org_desc, s.name section_name, s.description section_desc, e.section_id, e.org_id, p.name pos_name from pb2_ext_hr_employee e left join pb2_ext_res_org o on e.org_id = o.id left join pb2_ext_res_section s on e.section_id = s.id left join pb2_ext_hr_position p on e.position_id = p.id
WHERE (e.first_name ILIKE '%'||#{searchTerm}||'%' or e.last_name ILIKE '%'||#{searchTerm}||'%' or lpad(e.employee_code, 6 ,'0') ILIKE '%'||#{searchTerm}||'%' or p.name ILIKE '%'||#{searchTerm}||'%' or s.name ILIKE '%'||#{searchTerm}||'%' or o.name ILIKE '%'||#{searchTerm}||'%')
ORDER BY o.name, s.name, e.first_name, e.last_name
